item.title: The woman who filmed Waymo’s honking robotaxis got an apology promo—then spent all day using it
item.description:
Sophia Tung set up a livestream this past summer, showing self-driving Waymo cars honking from the San Francisco parking lot near her apartment at all hours of the night. As a kind of apology for the nuisance, Waymo threw an ice cream party in Tung’s building and gave Tung, a former Twitter engineer, some promo […]
